rutils

Class Coordinate

  • java.lang.Object
    • rutils.Coordinate

  • public class Coordinate
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing an (x,y) coordinate in 2D cartesian space
    Since:
    2/14/16

      • inBounds

        public boolean inBounds(int w,
                        int h)
        Determines if this Coordinate is in a bounded region
        Parameters:
        w - width
        h - height
        Returns:
        True if this is within the bounded area between w and h

      • calcRelativeLoc

        public Coordinate calcRelativeLoc(int dir)

      • calcRelativeLoc

        public Coordinate calcRelativeLoc(int dir,
                                  int ext)
        Calculates a new coordinate relative to an input coordinate Note that coordinate system is x pos is right and y pos is up
        Parameters:
        dir - The relative direction of the new point relative to the current point note that dir is in the set {0,1,2,3}, where 0=North, 1=East, 2=South, 3=West.
        ext - The distance between the new point and the current point i.e. ext(ension) of 0 is adjacent
        Returns:
        The new absolute coordinate, returns null if invalid dir

      • mDist

        public int mDist(Coordinate c)
        Calculates Manhattan distance to another coordinate
        Parameters:
        c - Coordinate to calculate distance to
        Returns:
        Manhattan distance

      • xDist

        public int xDist(Coordinate c)
        Returns:
        distance from this.x to c.x

      • yDist

        public int yDist(Coordinate c)
        Returns:
        distance from this.y to c.y
